channel.title: Mad Men on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Mad Men on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Zosia Mamet Calls ‘Mad Men’ Showrunner Matthew Weiner “Very Strict” After Revelations in New Book
item.description: The actress dives into her collection of essays ‘Does This Make Me Funny?,’ which includes a buzzy story about leaving one of the biggest shows on TV after being screamed at by the showrunner.
